title: Excel File Improvement Summary
content:
The following improvements have been applied to the Excel file:

*   Added a 'Category' column to the 'Account transactions from 1 Feb' sheet.
*   Standardized the date format across all sheets to DD/MM/YYYY.
*   Standardized descriptions and extracted vendor/recipient names in the 'Account transactions from 1 Feb' sheet. Added a 'Vendor/Recipient' column.
*   Formatted monetary values to two decimal places for GBP.
summary: Summary of improvements made to the Excel file.
